hints.content: First, find the bar that is for the Lions.

Next, find the number that is even with the top of the $\goldD{\text{Lions}}$ bar.

This number tells us how many games the Lions won.

$~$

[[☃ image 1]]

$~$

options.alt:
A vertical bar graph. Team is on
the horizontal axis. Games Won is on the vertical axis and has lines marking from 0 to 15. There are bars for each of the Teams: 1 bar for Lions, 1 bar for Tigers, and 1 bar for Bears.
•Lions, 14. 
•Tigers, 2.
• Bears, 7.

The number 14 is circled in Red on the vertical axis with a line extending to the Lions bar.

question.content:
The Lions, Tigers, and Bears won baseball games last summer.

This bar graph shows how many games each team won.

[[☃ image 1]]

 **How many games did the Lions win?**  

[[☃ input-number 1]] games

options.alt:
A vertical bar graph. Team is on
the horizontal axis. Games Won is on the vertical axis and has lines marking from 0 to 15. There are bars for each of the Teams: 1 bar for Lions, 1 bar for Tigers, and 1 bar for Bears.
•Lions, 14. 
•Tigers, 2.
• Bears, 7.
